attributes.action: Decriminalise all drugs and focus on rehabilitation opposed to criminalisation.
attributes.additional_details: Legalise Cannabis to support the economy, use proceeds of tax and regulation to fight organised crimes brought in by black market sources.
attributes.background: Focus on organised crime and not individuals.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you would like to see all drugs decriminalised but your petition text specifies cannabis only. It's not clear how you would like the Government to focus on organised crime and on rehabilitation, if this would be through funding or by other means.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. We have accepted petitions about decriminalising drugs before and you can view previous petitions on the topic below:

Legalise, Regulate and Tax all Recreational Drugs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603672

Legalise All Drugs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565329
